00035 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int btStrLen(const char* str)
00036 {
00037     if (!str)
00038                 return(0);
00039         int len = 0;
00040 
00041         while (*str != 0)
00042         {
00043         str++;
00044         len++;
00045     }
00046 
00047     return len;
00048 }

00109 #define BT_HEADER_LENGTH 12

00111 #       define BT_MAKE_ID(a,b,c,d) ( (int)(a)<<24 | (int)(b)<<16 | (c)<<8 | (d) )
00112 #else
00113 #       define BT_MAKE_ID(a,b,c,d) ( (int)(d)<<24 | (int)(c)<<16 | (b)<<8 | (a) )
00114 #endif

00214                 virtual void    writeDNA()
00215                 {
00216                         btChunk* dnaChunk = allocate(m_dnaLength,1);
00217                         memcpy(dnaChunk->m_oldPtr,m_dna,m_dnaLength);
00218                         finalizeChunk(dnaChunk,"DNA1",BT_DNA_CODE, m_dna);
00219                 }

00221                 int getReverseType(const char *type) const
00222                 {
00223 
00224                         btHashString key(type);
00225                         const int* valuePtr = mTypeLookup.find(key);
00226                         if (valuePtr)
00227                                 return *valuePtr;
00228 
00229                         return -1;
00230                 }
00231 
00232                 void initDNA(const char* bdnaOrg,int dnalen)
00233                 {
00235                         if (m_dna)
00236                                 return;
00237 
00238                         int littleEndian= 1;
00239                         littleEndian= ((char*)&littleEndian)[0];
00240 
00241 
00242                         m_dna = btAlignedAlloc(dnalen,16);
00243                         memcpy(m_dna,bdnaOrg,dnalen);
00244                         m_dnaLength = dnalen;
00245 
00246                         int *intPtr=0;
00247                         short *shtPtr=0;
00248                         char *cp = 0;int dataLen =0;
00249                         intPtr = (int*)m_dna;
00250 
00251                         /*
00252                                 SDNA (4 bytes) (magic number)
00253                                 NAME (4 bytes)
00254                                 <nr> (4 bytes) amount of names (int)
00255                                 <string>
00256                                 <string>
00257                         */
00258 
00259                         if (strncmp((const char*)m_dna, "SDNA", 4)==0)
00260                         {
00261                                 // skip ++ NAME
00262                                 intPtr++; intPtr++;
00263                         }
00264 
00265                         // Parse names
00266                         if (!littleEndian)
00267                                 *intPtr = btSwapEndian(*intPtr);
00268 
00269                         dataLen = *intPtr;
00270 
00271                         intPtr++;
00272 
00273                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00274                         int i;
00275                         for ( i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00276                         {
00277 
00278                                 while (*cp)cp++;
00279                                 cp++;
00280                         }
00281                         cp = btAlignPointer(cp,4);
00282 
00283                         /*
00284                                 TYPE (4 bytes)
00285                                 <nr> amount of types (int)
00286                                 <string>
00287                                 <string>
00288                         */
00289 
00290                         intPtr = (int*)cp;
00291                         btAssert(strncmp(cp, "TYPE", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00292 
00293                         if (!littleEndian)
00294                                 *intPtr =  btSwapEndian(*intPtr);
00295 
00296                         dataLen = *intPtr;
00297                         intPtr++;
00298 
00299 
00300                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00301                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00302                         {
00303                                 mTypes.push_back(cp);
00304                                 while (*cp)cp++;
00305                                 cp++;
00306                         }
00307 
00308                         cp = btAlignPointer(cp,4);
00309 
00310 
00311                         /*
00312                                 TLEN (4 bytes)
00313                                 <len> (short) the lengths of types
00314                                 <len>
00315                         */
00316 
00317                         // Parse type lens
00318                         intPtr = (int*)cp;
00319                         btAssert(strncmp(cp, "TLEN", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00320 
00321                         dataLen = (int)mTypes.size();
00322 
00323                         shtPtr = (short*)intPtr;
00324                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++, shtPtr++)
00325                         {
00326                                 if (!littleEndian)
00327                                         shtPtr[0] = btSwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00328                                 mTlens.push_back(shtPtr[0]);
00329                         }
00330 
00331                         if (dataLen & 1) shtPtr++;
00332 
00333                         /*
00334                                 STRC (4 bytes)
00335                                 <nr> amount of structs (int)
00336                                 <typenr>
00337                                 <nr_of_elems>
00338                                 <typenr>
00339                                 <namenr>
00340                                 <typenr>
00341                                 <namenr>
00342                         */
00343 
00344                         intPtr = (int*)shtPtr;
00345                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00346                         btAssert(strncmp(cp, "STRC", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00347 
00348                         if (!littleEndian)
00349                                 *intPtr = btSwapEndian(*intPtr);
00350                         dataLen = *intPtr ;
00351                         intPtr++;
00352 
00353 
00354                         shtPtr = (short*)intPtr;
00355                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00356                         {
00357                                 mStructs.push_back (shtPtr);
00358 
00359                                 if (!littleEndian)
00360                                 {
00361                                         shtPtr[0]= btSwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00362                                         shtPtr[1]= btSwapEndian(shtPtr[1]);
00363 
00364                                         int len = shtPtr[1];
00365                                         shtPtr+= 2;
00366 
00367                                         for (int a=0; a<len; a++, shtPtr+=2)
00368                                         {
00369                                                         shtPtr[0]= btSwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00370                                                         shtPtr[1]= btSwapEndian(shtPtr[1]);
00371                                         }
00372 
00373                                 } else
00374                                 {
00375                                         shtPtr+= (2*shtPtr[1])+2;
00376                                 }
00377                         }
00378 
00379                         // build reverse lookups
00380                         for (i=0; i<(int)mStructs.size(); i++)
00381                         {
00382                                 short *strc = mStructs.at(i);
00383                                 mStructReverse.insert(strc[0], i);
00384                                 mTypeLookup.insert(btHashString(mTypes[strc[0]]),i);
00385                         }
00386                 }

00392 
00393                 btDefaultSerializer(int totalSize=0, unsigned char*     buffer=0)
00394                         :m_uniqueIdGenerator(0),
00395                         m_totalSize(totalSize),
00396                         m_currentSize(0),
00397                         m_dna(0),
00398                         m_dnaLength(0),
00399                         m_serializationFlags(0)
00400                 {
00401                     if (buffer==0)
00402             {
00403                 m_buffer = m_totalSize?(unsigned char*)btAlignedAlloc(totalSize,16):0;
00404                 m_ownsBuffer = true;
00405             } else
00406             {
00407                 m_buffer = buffer;
00408                 m_ownsBuffer = false;
00409             }
00410 
00411                         const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*)==8));
00412 
00413 #ifdef BT_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00414                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00415                         {
00416 #if _WIN64
00417                                 initDNA((const char*)sBulletDNAstr64,sBulletDNAlen64);
00418 #else
00419                                 btAssert(0);
00420 #endif
00421                         } else
00422                         {
00423 #ifndef _WIN64
00424                                 initDNA((const char*)sBulletDNAstr,sBulletDNAlen);
00425 #else
00426                                 btAssert(0);
00427 #endif
00428                         }
00429 
00430 #else //BT_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00431                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00432                         {
00433                                 initDNA((const char*)sBulletDNAstr64,sBulletDNAlen64);
00434                         } else
00435                         {
00436                                 initDNA((const char*)sBulletDNAstr,sBulletDNAlen);
00437                         }
00438 #endif //BT_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00439 
00440                 }

00445                                 btAlignedFree(m_buffer);
00446                         if (m_dna)
00447                                 btAlignedFree(m_dna);
00448                 }

00452                         const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*) == 8));
00453 
00454                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00455                         {
00456                                 return sBulletDNAlen64;
00457                         }
00458                         return sBulletDNAlen;
00459                 }
00460                 static const char* getMemoryDna()
00461                 {
00462                         const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*) == 8));
00463                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00464                         {
00465                                 return (const char*)sBulletDNAstr64;
00466                         }
00467                         return (const char*)sBulletDNAstr;
00468                 }

00470                 void    insertHeader()
00471                 {
00472                         writeHeader(m_buffer);
00473                         m_currentSize += BT_HEADER_LENGTH;
00474                 }
00475 
00476                 void    writeHeader(unsigned char* buffer) const
00477                 {
00478 
00479 
00480 #ifdef  BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00481                         memcpy(buffer, "BULLETd", 7);
00482 #else
00483                         memcpy(buffer, "BULLETf", 7);
00484 #endif //BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00485 
00486                         int littleEndian= 1;
00487                         littleEndian= ((char*)&littleEndian)[0];
00488 
00489                         if (sizeof(void*)==8)
00490                         {
00491                                 buffer[7] = '-';
00492                         } else
00493                         {
00494                                 buffer[7] = '_';
00495                         }
00496 
00497                         if (littleEndian)
00498                         {
00499                                 buffer[8]='v';
00500                         } else
00501                         {
00502                                 buffer[8]='V';
00503                         }
00504 
00505 
00506                         buffer[9] = '2';
00507                         buffer[10] = '8';
00508                         buffer[11] = '7';
00509 
00510                 }
00511 
00512                 virtual void    startSerialization()
00513                 {
00514                         m_uniqueIdGenerator= 1;
00515                         if (m_totalSize)
00516                         {
00517                                 unsigned char* buffer = internalAlloc(BT_HEADER_LENGTH);
00518                                 writeHeader(buffer);
00519                         }
00520 
00521                 }
00522 
00523                 virtual void    finishSerialization()
00524                 {
00525                         writeDNA();
00526 
00527                         //if we didn't pre-allocate a buffer, we need to create a contiguous buffer now
00528                         int mysize = 0;
00529                         if (!m_totalSize)
00530                         {
00531                                 if (m_buffer)
00532                                         btAlignedFree(m_buffer);
00533 
00534                                 m_currentSize += BT_HEADER_LENGTH;
00535                                 m_buffer = (unsigned char*)btAlignedAlloc(m_currentSize,16);
00536 
00537                                 unsigned char* currentPtr = m_buffer;
00538                                 writeHeader(m_buffer);
00539                                 currentPtr += BT_HEADER_LENGTH;
00540                                 mysize+=BT_HEADER_LENGTH;
00541                                 for (int i=0;i< m_chunkPtrs.size();i++)
00542                                 {
00543                                         int curLength = sizeof(btChunk)+m_chunkPtrs[i]->m_length;
00544                                         memcpy(currentPtr,m_chunkPtrs[i], curLength);
00545                                         btAlignedFree(m_chunkPtrs[i]);
00546                                         currentPtr+=curLength;
00547                                         mysize+=curLength;
00548                                 }
00549                         }
00550 
00551                         mTypes.clear();
00552                         mStructs.clear();
00553                         mTlens.clear();
00554                         mStructReverse.clear();
00555                         mTypeLookup.clear();
00556                         m_skipPointers.clear();
00557                         m_chunkP.clear();
00558                         m_nameMap.clear();
00559                         m_uniquePointers.clear();
00560                         m_chunkPtrs.clear();
00561                 }
00562 
00563                 virtual void*   getUniquePointer(void*oldPtr)
00564                 {
00565                         btAssert(m_uniqueIdGenerator >= 0);
00566                         if (!oldPtr)
00567                                 return 0;
00568 
00569                         btPointerUid* uptr = (btPointerUid*)m_uniquePointers.find(oldPtr);
00570                         if (uptr)
00571                         {
00572                                 return uptr->m_ptr;
00573                         }
00574 
00575                         void** ptr2 = m_skipPointers[oldPtr];
00576             if (ptr2)
00577                         {
00578                                 return 0;
00579                         }
00580 
00581                         m_uniqueIdGenerator++;
00582 
00583                         btPointerUid uid;
00584                         uid.m_uniqueIds[0] = m_uniqueIdGenerator;
00585                         uid.m_uniqueIds[1] = m_uniqueIdGenerator;
00586                         m_uniquePointers.insert(oldPtr,uid);
00587                         return uid.m_ptr;
00588 
00589                 }

00601                 virtual void    finalizeChunk(btChunk* chunk, const char* structType, int chunkCode,void* oldPtr)
00602                 {
00603                         if (!(m_serializationFlags&BT_SERIALIZE_NO_DUPLICATE_ASSERT))
00604                         {
00605                                 btAssert(!findPointer(oldPtr));
00606                         }
00607 
00608                         chunk->m_dna_nr = getReverseType(structType);
00609 
00610                         chunk->m_chunkCode = chunkCode;
00611 
00612                         void* uniquePtr = getUniquePointer(oldPtr);
00613 
00614                         m_chunkP.insert(oldPtr,uniquePtr);//chunk->m_oldPtr);
00615                         chunk->m_oldPtr = uniquePtr;//oldPtr;
00616 
00617                 }
00618 
00619 
00620                 virtual unsigned char* internalAlloc(size_t size)
00621                 {
00622                         unsigned char* ptr = 0;
00623 
00624                         if (m_totalSize)
00625                         {
00626                                 ptr = m_buffer+m_currentSize;
00627                                 m_currentSize += int(size);
00628                                 btAssert(m_currentSize<m_totalSize);
00629                         } else
00630                         {
00631                                 ptr = (unsigned char*)btAlignedAlloc(size,16);
00632                                 m_currentSize += int(size);
00633                         }
00634                         return ptr;
00635                 }
00636 
00637 
00638 
00639                 virtual btChunk*        allocate(size_t size, int numElements)
00640                 {
00641 
00642                         unsigned char* ptr = internalAlloc(int(size)*numElements+sizeof(btChunk));
00643 
00644                         unsigned char* data = ptr + sizeof(btChunk);
00645 
00646                         btChunk* chunk = (btChunk*)ptr;
00647                         chunk->m_chunkCode = 0;
00648                         chunk->m_oldPtr = data;
00649                         chunk->m_length = int(size)*numElements;
00650                         chunk->m_number = numElements;
00651 
00652                         m_chunkPtrs.push_back(chunk);
00653 
00654 
00655                         return chunk;
00656                 }

00658                 virtual const char*     findNameForPointer(const void* ptr) const
00659                 {
00660                         const char*const * namePtr = m_nameMap.find(ptr);
00661                         if (namePtr && *namePtr)
00662                                 return *namePtr;
00663                         return 0;
00664 
00665                 }

00667                 virtual void    registerNameForPointer(const void* ptr, const char* name)
00668                 {
00669                         m_nameMap.insert(ptr,name);
00670                 }
00671 
00672                 virtual void    serializeName(const char* name)
00673                 {
00674                         if (name)
00675                         {
00676                                 //don't serialize name twice
00677                                 if (findPointer((void*)name))
00678                                         return;
00679 
00680                                 int len = btStrLen(name);
00681                                 if (len)
00682                                 {
00683 
00684                                         int newLen = len+1;
00685                                         int padding = ((newLen+3)&~3)-newLen;
00686                                         newLen += padding;
00687 
00688                                         //serialize name string now
00689                                         btChunk* chunk = allocate(sizeof(char),newLen);
00690                                         char* destinationName = (char*)chunk->m_oldPtr;
00691                                         for (int i=0;i<len;i++)
00692                                         {
00693                                                 destinationName[i] = name[i];
00694                                         }
00695                                         destinationName[len] = 0;
00696                                         finalizeChunk(chunk,"char",BT_ARRAY_CODE,(void*)name);
00697                                 }
00698                         }
00699                 }

00709                 }
00710                 int getNumChunks() const
00711                 {
00712                         return m_chunkPtrs.size();
00713                 }
00714 
00715                 const btChunk* getChunk(int chunkIndex) const
00716                 {
00717                         return m_chunkPtrs[chunkIndex];
00718                 }
00719 };
00720 
00721 
00727 #ifdef ENABLE_INMEMORY_SERIALIZER
00728 
00729 struct btInMemorySerializer : public btDefaultSerializer
00730 {
00731     btHashMap<btHashPtr,btChunk*> m_uid2ChunkPtr;
00732     btHashMap<btHashPtr,void*> m_orgPtr2UniqueDataPtr;
00733     btHashMap<btHashString,const void*> m_names2Ptr;
00734     
00735 
00736     btBulletSerializedArrays    m_arrays;
00737 
00738     btInMemorySerializer(int totalSize=0, unsigned char*        buffer=0)
00739     :btDefaultSerializer(totalSize,buffer)
00740     {
00741         
00742     }
00743 
00744     virtual void startSerialization()
00745     {
00746         m_uid2ChunkPtr.clear();
00747         //todo: m_arrays.clear();
00748         btDefaultSerializer::startSerialization();
00749     }
00750 
00751     
00752 
00753     btChunk* findChunkFromUniquePointer(void* uniquePointer)
00754     {
00755         btChunk** chkPtr = m_uid2ChunkPtr[uniquePointer];
00756         if (chkPtr)
00757         {
00758             return *chkPtr;
00759         }
00760         return 0;
00761     }
00762 
00763         virtual void    registerNameForPointer(const void* ptr, const char* name)
00764     {
00765        btDefaultSerializer::registerNameForPointer(ptr,name);
00766        m_names2Ptr.insert(name,ptr);
00767     }
00768 
00769     virtual void finishSerialization()
00770     {
00771     }
00772 
00773     virtual void* getUniquePointer(void*oldPtr)
00774     {
00775         if (oldPtr==0)
00776             return 0;
00777 
00778         // void* uniquePtr = getUniquePointer(oldPtr);
00779         btChunk* chunk = findChunkFromUniquePointer(oldPtr);
00780         if (chunk)
00781         {
00782             return chunk->m_oldPtr;
00783         } else
00784         {
00785             const char* n = (const char*) oldPtr;
00786             const void** ptr = m_names2Ptr[n];
00787             if (ptr)
00788             {
00789                 return oldPtr;
00790             } else
00791             {
00792                         void** ptr2 = m_skipPointers[oldPtr];
00793                         if (ptr2)
00794                                                                 {
00795                                                                         return 0;
00796                                                                 } else
00797                                                                 {
00798                                                                         //If this assert hit, serialization happened in the wrong order
00799                                                                         // 'getUniquePointer'
00800                                                                         btAssert(0);
00801                                                                 }
00802 
00803             }
00804             return 0;
00805         }
00806                                 return oldPtr;
00807     }
00808 
00809     virtual void finalizeChunk(btChunk* chunk, const char* structType, int chunkCode,void* oldPtr)
00810     {
00811         if (!(m_serializationFlags&BT_SERIALIZE_NO_DUPLICATE_ASSERT))
00812         {
00813             btAssert(!findPointer(oldPtr));
00814         }
00815 
00816         chunk->m_dna_nr = getReverseType(structType);
00817         chunk->m_chunkCode = chunkCode;
00818         //void* uniquePtr = getUniquePointer(oldPtr);
00819         m_chunkP.insert(oldPtr,oldPtr);//chunk->m_oldPtr);
00820         // chunk->m_oldPtr = uniquePtr;//oldPtr;
00821 
00822         void* uid = findPointer(oldPtr);
00823         m_uid2ChunkPtr.insert(uid,chunk);
00824 
00825         switch (chunk->m_chunkCode)
00826                         {
00827                         case BT_SOFTBODY_CODE:
00828                         {
00829         #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00830                                         m_arrays.m_softBodyDoubleData.push_back((btSoftBodyDoubleData*) chunk->m_oldPtr);
00831         #else
00832                                         m_arrays.m_softBodyFloatData.push_back((btSoftBodyFloatData*) chunk->m_oldPtr);
00833         #endif
00834                                         break;
00835                                 }
00836                         case BT_COLLISIONOBJECT_CODE:
00837                                 {
00838         #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00839                                         m_arrays.m_collisionObjectDataDouble.push_back((btCollisionObjectDoubleData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00840         #else//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00841                                         m_arrays.m_collisionObjectDataFloat.push_back((btCollisionObjectFloatData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00842         #endif //BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00843                                         break;
00844                                 }
00845                         case BT_RIGIDBODY_CODE:
00846                                 {
00847         #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00848                                         m_arrays.m_rigidBodyDataDouble.push_back((btRigidBodyDoubleData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00849         #else
00850                                         m_arrays.m_rigidBodyDataFloat.push_back((btRigidBodyFloatData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00851         #endif//BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00852                                         break;
00853                                 };
00854                         case BT_CONSTRAINT_CODE:
00855                                 {
00856         #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00857                                         m_arrays.m_constraintDataDouble.push_back((btTypedConstraintDoubleData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00858         #else
00859                                         m_arrays.m_constraintDataFloat.push_back((btTypedConstraintFloatData*)chunk->m_oldPtr);
00860         #endif
00861                                         break;
00862                                 }
00863                         case BT_QUANTIZED_BVH_CODE:
00864                                 {
00865         #ifdef BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00866                                         m_arrays.m_bvhsDouble.push_back((btQuantizedBvhDoubleData*) chunk->m_oldPtr);
00867         #else
00868                                         m_arrays.m_bvhsFloat.push_back((btQuantizedBvhFloatData*) chunk->m_oldPtr);
00869         #endif
00870                                         break;
00871                                 }
00872 
00873                         case BT_SHAPE_CODE:
00874                                 {
00875                                         btCollisionShapeData* shapeData = (btCollisionShapeData*) chunk->m_oldPtr;
00876                                         m_arrays.m_colShapeData.push_back(shapeData);
00877                                         break;
00878                                 }
00879                         case BT_TRIANLGE_INFO_MAP:
00880                         case BT_ARRAY_CODE:
00881                         case BT_SBMATERIAL_CODE:
00882                         case BT_SBNODE_CODE:
00883                         case BT_DYNAMICSWORLD_CODE:
00884                         case BT_DNA_CODE:
00885                                 {
00886                                         break;
00887                                 }
00888                         default:
00889                                 {
00890                                 }
00891                         };
00892     }
00893 
00894     int getNumChunks() const
00895     {
00896         return m_uid2ChunkPtr.size();
00897     }
00898 
00899     const btChunk* getChunk(int chunkIndex) const
00900     {
00901         return *m_uid2ChunkPtr.getAtIndex(chunkIndex);
00902     }
00903 
00904 };
00905 #endif //ENABLE_INMEMORY_SERIALIZER
00906 
00907 #endif //BT_SERIALIZER_H
